data.name: Magic Balls
data.detailed_description:
Tired of the everyday hustle and bustle? Need a brain workout? Tired of the same type of Bubble Shooter games? Then we dare to suggest that you play Magic Balls, because this is not only a relaxing puzzle improved by various unique gameplay mechanics, but also an excellent game for developing the speed of thinking for both adults and children!

Magic Balls is a puzzle of the Bubble Shooter genre that will once and for all change your idea of ​​the games of this genre with novelties in the gameplay: various bonuses, balls changing in color and several attempts to overcome the level!

Game features:
- Lots of game bonuses!
- Nice and relaxing graphics
- Educational puzzle
- For the whole family
